Author: Sam Boutros
Summary: In many cases we can obtain the IP address of a network interface via one command but get the MAC address from another command. StorSimple 8k series which runs a core version of server 2012 R2 (as of 20 June 2016) is no exception. In this case we can get the IP address informat
Title: Powershell script to list StorSimple network interface information including MAC
UserTags: Powershell, StorSimple, Get StorSimple MAC addresses
